sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>7</base_damage> <critical_rating>5</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>A larger version of the slugthrower pistol, the slugthrower rifle also uses chemical reactions to fire a solid projectile "slug" at high velocities towards a target. Slugthrower rifles sport much longer and larger barrels than pistols, and can fire larger slugs over longer distances. However, they still suffer from poor accuracy and penetration, not to mention requiring uncommon ammunition that may either be hand-made and unreliable or prohibitively expensive.  However, many primitive and nomadic cultures use slugthrower rifles, often of some homemade variant. One such example are the Tusken Raiders of Tatooine. The primitive and violent nomads have little access to the kind of gas used by blasters and even less to XCiter technology. They are able to occasionally capture ammunition in raids on the planet's moisture farms, however, and use the rounds in their crude, longrange sniper rifles. These weapons are quite effective against the lone settlers, diminutive Jawas, and womp rats that share their harsh desert.   Models Include: Dresselian Projectile Rifle, Czerka Arms 6-2Aug2 Hunting Rifle.</description> <encumbrance>5</encumbrance> <hard_points>1</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Slugthrower Rifle</name> <number>GEAR0001016</number> <price>250</price> <range>medium</range> <rarity>3</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Heavy (Ag)">d8a0d55cdbae88542901de90cf9619c0</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 15:02:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9ed6aaa42f10a450e0f497eef699b6fa</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 15:02:23</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
